module.onboarding.troubleshootingInstruc: Follow the instructions below and try to connect again:
module.onboarding.troubleshootingSteps1: Remove the USB cable from your Mudita device and this computer

module.onboarding.troubleshootingSteps4: Reconnect your Mudita device with this computer
module.onboarding.troubleshootingSteps4a: Make sure you’re using the cable that came with your Mudita device
module.onboarding.troubleshootingSteps4b: Make sure the cable plug goes all the way into the port
module.onboarding.troubleshootingSteps5: Unlock your Mudita device's screen (if applicable)
